013package org.apache.juneau.microservice.resources;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.IOUtils.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.StringUtils.*;
017import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.Utils.*;
018import java.io.*;
019import java.util.*;
020
021import org.apache.juneau.annotation.*;
022import org.apache.juneau.bean.*;
023import org.apache.juneau.config.*;
024import org.apache.juneau.html.annotation.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.http.annotation.*;
026import org.apache.juneau.http.response.*;
027import org.apache.juneau.rest.*;
028import org.apache.juneau.rest.annotation.*;
029import org.apache.juneau.rest.beans.*;
030import org.apache.juneau.rest.servlet.*;
031
032/**
033 * REST resource that allows access to a file system directory.
034 *
035 * <p>
036 * The root directory is specified in one of two ways:
037 * <ul class='spaced-list'>
038 *    <li>
039 *       Specifying the location via a <l>DirectoryResource.rootDir</l> property.
040 *    <li>
041 *       Overriding the {@link #getRootDir()} method.
042 * </ul>
043 *
044 * <p>
045 * Read/write access control is handled through the following properties:
046 * <ul class='spaced-list'>
047 *    <li>
048 *       <l>DirectoryResource.allowViews</l> - If <jk>true</jk>, allows view and download access to files.
049 *    <li>
050 *       <l>DirectoryResource.allowUploads</l> - If <jk>true</jk>, allows files to be created or overwritten.
051 *    <li>
052 *       <l>DirectoryResource.allowDeletes</l> - If <jk>true</jk>, allows files to be deleted.
053 * </ul>
054 *
055 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
056 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauMicroserviceCoreBasics">juneau-microservice-core Basics</a>
057 * </ul>
058 *
059 * @serial exclude
060 */
061@Rest(
062   title="File System Explorer",
063   messages="nls/DirectoryResource",
064   allowedMethodParams="*"
065)
066@HtmlDocConfig(
067   navlinks={
068      "up: request:/..",
069      "api: servlet:/api"
070   }
071)
072@HtmlConfig(uriAnchorText="PROPERTY_NAME")
073@SuppressWarnings("javadoc")
074public class DirectoryResource extends BasicRestServlet {
075   private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
076
077   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
078   // Configurable properties
079   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
080
081   private static final String PREFIX = "DirectoryResource.";
082
083   /**
084    * Root directory.
085    */
086   public static final String DIRECTORY_RESOURCE_rootDir = PREFIX + "rootDir.s";
087
088   /**
089    * Allow view and downloads on files.
090    */
091   public static final String DIRECTORY_RESOURCE_allowViews = PREFIX + "allowViews.b";
092
093   /**
094    * Allow deletes on files.
095    */
096   public static final String DIRECTORY_RESOURCE_allowDeletes = PREFIX + "allowDeletes.b";
097
098   /**
099    * Allow uploads on files.
100    */
101   public static final String DIRECTORY_RESOURCE_allowUploads = PREFIX + "allowUploads.b";
102
103
104   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
105   // Instance
106   //-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
107
108   private final File rootDir;     // The root directory
109
110   // Properties enabled through servlet init parameters
111   final boolean allowDeletes, allowUploads, allowViews;
112
113   public DirectoryResource(Config c) throws Exception {
114      rootDir = new File(c.get(DIRECTORY_RESOURCE_rootDir).orElse("."));
115      allowViews = c.get(DIRECTORY_RESOURCE_allowViews).asBoolean().orElse(false);
116      allowDeletes = c.get(DIRECTORY_RESOURCE_allowDeletes).asBoolean().orElse(false);
117      allowUploads = c.get(DIRECTORY_RESOURCE_allowUploads).asBoolean().orElse(false);
118   }
119
120   @RestGet(
121      path="/*",
122      summary="View information on file or directory",
123      description="Returns information about the specified file or directory."
124   )
125   @HtmlDocConfig(
126      nav={"<h5>Folder:  $RA{fullPath}</h5>"}
127   )
128   public FileResource getFile(RestRequest req, @Path("/*") String path) throws NotFound, Exception {
129
130      File dir = getFile(path);
131      req.setAttribute("fullPath", dir.getAbsolutePath());
132
133      return new FileResource(dir, path, true);
134   }
135
136   @RestOp(
137      method="VIEW",
138      path="/*",
139      summary="View contents of file",
140      description="View the contents of a file.\nContent-Type is set to 'text/plain'."
141   )
142   public FileContents viewFile(RestResponse res, @Path("/*") String path) throws NotFound, MethodNotAllowed {
143      if (! allowViews)
144         throw new MethodNotAllowed("VIEW not enabled");
145
146      res.setContentType("text/plain");
147      try {
148         return new FileContents(getFile(path));
149      } catch (FileNotFoundException e) {
150         throw new NotFound("File not found");
151      }
152   }
153
154   @RestOp(
155      method="DOWNLOAD",
156      path="/*",
157      summary="Download file",
158      description="Download the contents of a file.\nContent-Type is set to 'application/octet-stream'."
159   )
160   public FileContents downloadFile(RestResponse res, @Path("/*") String path) throws NotFound, MethodNotAllowed {
161      if (! allowViews)
162         throw new MethodNotAllowed("DOWNLOAD not enabled");
163
164      res.setContentType("application/octet-stream");
165      try {
166         return new FileContents(getFile(path));
167      } catch (FileNotFoundException e) {
168         throw new NotFound("File not found");
169      }
170   }
171
172   @RestDelete(
173      path="/*",
174      summary="Delete file",
175      description="Delete a file on the file system."
176   )
177   public RedirectToRoot deleteFile(@Path("/*") String path) throws MethodNotAllowed {
178      deleteFile(getFile(path));
179      return new RedirectToRoot();
180   }
181
182   @RestPut(
183      path="/*",
184      summary="Add or replace file",
185      description="Add or overwrite a file on the file system."
186   )
187   public RedirectToRoot updateFile(
188      @Content @Schema(type="string",format="binary") InputStream is,
189      @Path("/*") String path
190   ) throws InternalServerError {
191
192      if (! allowUploads)
193         throw new MethodNotAllowed("PUT not enabled");
194
195      File f = getFile(path);
196
197      try (OutputStream os = new BufferedOutputStream(new FileOutputStream(f))) {
198         pipe(is, os);
199      } catch (IOException e) {
200         throw new InternalServerError(e);
201      }
202
203      return new RedirectToRoot();
204   }
205
206   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
207   // Helper beans
208   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
209
210   @Response @Schema(type="string",format="binary",description="Contents of file")
211   static class FileContents extends FileInputStream {
212      public FileContents(File file) throws FileNotFoundException {
213         super(file);
214      }
215   }
216
217   @Response @Schema(description="Redirect to root page on success")
218   static class RedirectToRoot extends SeeOtherRoot {}
219
220   @Response @Schema(description="File action")
221   public static class Action extends LinkString {
222      public Action(String name, String uri, Object...uriArgs) {
223         super(name, uri, uriArgs);
224      }
225   }
226
227   @Response @Schema(description="File or directory details")
228   @Bean(properties="type,name,size,lastModified,actions,files")
229   public class FileResource {
230      private final File f;
231      private final String path;
232      private final String uri;
233      private final boolean includeChildren;
234
235      public FileResource(File f, String path, boolean includeChildren) {
236         this.f = f;
237         this.path = path;
238         this.uri = "servlet:/"+(path == null ? "" : path);
239         this.includeChildren = includeChildren;
240      }
241
242      public String getType() {
243         return (f.isDirectory() ? "dir" : "file");
244      }
245
246      public LinkString getName() {
247         return new LinkString(f.getName(), uri);
248      }
249
250      public long getSize() {
251         return f.isDirectory() ? f.listFiles().length : f.length();
252      }
253
254      public Date getLastModified() {
255         return new Date(f.lastModified());
256      }
257
258      @Html(format=HtmlFormat.HTML_CDC)
259      public List<Action> getActions() throws Exception {
260         List<Action> l = list();
261         if (allowViews && f.canRead() && ! f.isDirectory()) {
262            l.add(new Action("view", uri + "?method=VIEW"));
263            l.add(new Action("download", uri + "?method=DOWNLOAD"));
264         }
265         if (allowDeletes && f.canWrite() && ! f.isDirectory())
266            l.add(new Action("delete", uri + "?method=DELETE"));
267         return l;
268      }
269
270      public Set<FileResource> getFiles() {
271         if (f.isFile() || ! includeChildren)
272            return null;
273         Set<FileResource> s = new TreeSet<>(new FileResourceComparator());
274         for (File fc : f.listFiles())
275            s.add(new FileResource(fc, (path != null ? (path + '/') : "") + urlEncode(fc.getName()), false));
276         return s;
277      }
278   }
279
280   static final class FileResourceComparator implements Comparator<FileResource>, Serializable {
281      private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
282      @Override /* Comparator */
283      public int compare(FileResource o1, FileResource o2) {
284         int c = o1.getType().compareTo(o2.getType());
285         return c != 0 ? c : o1.getName().compareTo(o2.getName());
286      }
287   }
288
289   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
290   // Helper methods
291   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
292
293   /**
294    * Returns the root directory.
295    *
296    * @return The root directory.
297    */
298   protected File getRootDir() {
299      return rootDir;
300   }
301
302   private File getFile(String path) throws NotFound {
303      if (path == null)
304         return rootDir;
305      File f = new File(rootDir.getAbsolutePath() + '/' + path);
306      if (f.exists())
307         return f;
308      throw new NotFound("File not found.");
309   }
310
311   private void deleteFile(File f) {
312      if (! allowDeletes)
313         throw new MethodNotAllowed("DELETE not enabled");
314      if (f.isDirectory()) {
315         File[] files = f.listFiles();
316         if (files != null) {
317            for (File fc : files)
318               deleteFile(fc);
319         }
320      }
321      if (! f.delete())
322         throw new Forbidden("Could not delete file {0}", f.getAbsolutePath()) ;
323   }
324}
